alert.note: Alert for Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Menard County through 1000 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Menard, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Menard around 925 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 1773 and The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Highway 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
